OrgName: OneNeck IT Solutions, LLC formerly doing business as TDS Hosted & Managed Services, LLC (“TDS HMS”) and its wholly-owned subsidiaries, OneNeck IT Services Corp., Vital Support Systems, TEAM Technologies, and VISI Incorporated
activities: OneNeck IT Solutions, LLC (formerly known as TDS Hosted & Managed Services, LLC) and its wholly-owned subsidiaries, OneNeck IT Services Corp., Vital Support Systems, TEAM Technologies, and VISI Incorporated, process and store confidential information through services provided to its clients. The data resides on servers that are managed by both OneNeck IT Solutions and its clients. This service is in conjunction with the information technology solutions provided by OneNeck IT Solutions to its clients. Any personal information gathered on our website is used to request additional information about employment opportunities, services or upcoming events.
